resources.string:
Browse The Web
While You Save Animals

Up to a million species are facing extinction - some within the next decade - unless we take immediate action to save them.

The idea behind our browser is simple - we want to give everyone opportunity to save animals. 100% of profits from advertising, search and partner programs will be transparently donated to animal funds all over the world.

Our team puts lots of efforts to make Wild Browser fast, secure and friendly for every day use.

Make A Wild Browser
Your Default Browser
The more you use our browser, the better we can help animals. Make Wild browser your default browser to protect the species right now.

Invite Friends And Make
A Difference For Wildlife

Wild Browser is committed to helping animal funds in most effective ways possible. We don\'t want to spend money on marketing but instead we kindly ask you to help our growth by inviting a friend or sharing information about us.

Choose Who You
Would Like to Support
By default all profits are donated equally among animal support funds. However, if you prefer you can decide to whom to address help:
